item.title: 002 RR Virtual Machines, Concurrency, and the Future of Ruby
item.dc:creator: chuck@teachmetocode.com (Charles Max Wood)
item.description: Panelists: Charles Max Wood (@cmaxw) David Brady (@dbrady) Evan Phoenix (@evanphx) James Edward Gray II (@JEG2) Peter Cooper (@peterc) Tools and topics mentioned in this episode: Rubinius JRuby Maglev MRI (Ruby 1.8.x) Yarv (Ruby 1.9.x) JIT compilers Java Virtual Machine (JVM) Global Interpreter Lock (GIL) Thread Safety Picks: Brain Rules for Baby (James) Affiliate link [...]
item.content:encoded:
Panelists:

  • Charles Max Wood (@cmaxw)
  • David Brady (@dbrady)
  • Evan Phoenix (@evanphx)
  • James Edward Gray II (@JEG2)
  • Peter Cooper (@peterc)

Tools and topics mentioned in this episode:

  • Rubinius
  • JRuby
  • Maglev
  • MRI (Ruby 1.8.x)
  • Yarv (Ruby 1.9.x)
  • JIT compilers
  • Java Virtual Machine (JVM)
  • Global Interpreter Lock (GIL)
  • Thread Safety

Picks:

  • Brain Rules for Baby (James) Affiliate link
  • Free-Range Kids (James) Affiliate link
  • The Panic-Free Pregnancy (Evan) Affiliate link
  • CoffeeScriptCookbook.com (Dave)
  • RailsCasts (Peter)
  • MailChimp (Peter) Referral link
  • Sickpedia (Peter) NOTE: Peter says this is NSFW.
  • macvim (Chuck)
  • janus (Chuck)
  • RVM (Chuck)
  • Trader Tales (Chuck)
  • ack (Evan)
  • git-grep (Evan)

The music is “Not Your Choice” by Wetnurse and available on Metal Sucks.
